books.author: by Arianna Huffington
books.description: Personal well-being as the indispensable third measure — after money and power — of success.
books.name: THRIVE

books.author: by Todd Burpo with Lynn Vincent
books.description: A father recounts his 3-year-old son’s encounter with Jesus during an appendectomy.
books.name: HEAVEN IS FOR REAL

books.author: by Solomon Northup
books.description: The narrative, first published in 1853, of a freeman who was kidnapped and sold into slavery, and spent 12 years in bondage before escaping; the basis of the movie.
books.name: TWELVE YEARS A SLAVE

books.author: by Jimmy Carter
books.description: The former president denounces discrimination and violence against women.
books.name: CALL TO ACTION

books.author: by Edith H. Beer with Susan Dworkin
books.description: The story of a Jewish woman who hid her identity and married a Nazi Party member, thus saving her life.
books.name: THE NAZI OFFICER'S WIFE

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of "The O'Reilly Factor" recounts the events leading up to Jesus' execution.
books.name: KILLING JESUS

books.author: by Dan Harris
books.description: A co-anchor of "Nightline" reports on the science and spiritual dimensions of meditation and  how it has improved his life.
books.name: 10% HAPPIER

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Marcus Luttrell with Patrick Robinson
books.description: The only survivor of a Navy SEALs operation in northern Afghanistan describes the battle and his escape. First published in 2007; the basis for the movie.
books.name: LONE SURVIVOR

books.author: by Greg Gutfeld
books.description: The Fox News Channel host, author of “The Joy of Hate,” denounces the hipster elite and their pop cultural dominance.
books.name: NOT COOL

books.author: by Robert M. Edsel with Bret Witter
books.description: The fight to preserve art works stolen by the Nazis during World War II. The basis for the movie.
books.name: THE MONUMENTS MEN

books.author: by Sheryl Sandberg with Nell Scovell
books.description: The chief operating officer of Facebook urges women to pursue their careers without ambivalence.
books.name: LEAN IN

books.author: by Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: How disadvantages can work in our favor; from the author of "The Tipping Point" and "Outliers."
books.name: DAVID AND GOLIATH

books.author: by Susan Cain
books.description: Introverts — one-third of the population — are undervalued in American society.
books.name: QUIET
